name: Molybdenum
description: Molybdenum is a Group 6 chemical element with the symbol Mo and atomic number 42. Molybdenum minerals have been known into prehistory, but the element was "discovered" (in the sense of differentiating it as a new entity from the mineral salts of other metals) in 1778 by Carl Wilhelm Scheele. The metal was first isolated in 1781 by Peter Jacob Hjelm.
